# Deployer class

Deploy new programs

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class Deployer
```

## Example

```jsx
import { ThirdwebSDK } from "@thirdweb-dev/sdk/solana";

// Instantiate the SDK and pass in a signer
const sdk = ThirdwebSDK.fromNetwork("devnet", {
  clientId: "YOUR_CLIENT_ID", // Use client id if using on the client side, get it from dashboard settings
  secretKey: "YOUR_SECRET_KEY", // Use secret key if using on the server, get it from dashboard settings
});
sdk.wallet.connect(signer);

// Define the metadata for your program
const metadata = {
  name: "NFT Contract",
  image: readFileSync("files/image.jpg"),
};

// And deploy a new program from the connected wallet
const address = await sdk.deployer.createNftCollection(metadata);
```

## Constructors

| Constructor                                                                   | Modifiers | Description                                                  |
| ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------ |
| [(constructor)(registry, metaplex, storage)](./sdk.deployer._constructor_.md) |           | Constructs a new instance of the <code>Deployer</code> class |

## Methods

| Method                                                                           | Modifiers | Description                         |
| -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------------------------------- |
| [createNftCollection(collectionMetadata)](./sdk.deployer.createnftcollection.md) |           | Create a new NFT collection program |
| [createNftDrop(metadata)](./sdk.deployer.createnftdrop.md)                       |           | Create a new NFT drop program       |
| [createToken(tokenMetadata)](./sdk.deployer.createtoken.md)                      |           | Create a new token program          |
